page.title: 11Reading's Third Bridge
page.content: At the moment people have three bridges to choose from,{Caversham {Bridge and Reading Bridge,}and further away,{Sonning Bridge.}There are many traffic jams at the bridges and on the approach roads to them. For people who live in Sonning there is another problem. They have to cross an old bridge which is slowly going into ruins. It has traffic lights and can only take traffic one way at a time. For several years{Berkshire County {Council}have been considering plans for a new Thames bridge.{Oxfordshire {County Council}do not want a bridge so much because they are afraid it will lead to development on their side of the river.
